extendedInfo.description: Evite for Android makes it easy to send and manage invitations on the go. With the Evite app, you can create and send invitations, manage your guest lists, and RSVP to events. You can also choose to get push notifications for event updates and when guests RSVP or add comments.

reviews.title: Does the job quickly and easily
reviews.comment: Fairly usefully and easy to use.  Very good for getting a group together for just about anything
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Everything works great.  Awesome and easy to use and super quick.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: The ability to add comments was a great improvement,  but it would be great if we could auto add to calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best party invite I\'ve used.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using evite for some time and since the app I have found it even easier! Great program.
reviews.author: Charrie Stroud-Kafouros

reviews.title: Love Evite
reviews.comment: It is easy and free. I can tell many people the same information in less than a minute. Great site, brilliantly colorful invitations to choose from...I love it!
reviews.author: Melba Thompson

reviews.title: Needs FB login option
reviews.comment: The evite app is great to have but when I throw a shindig I use the website bc I can\'t login with Facebook on the app and that\'s how I am registered! Please add this feature!!!
reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: Could be better. It would be nice to be able to import from my contacts on my phone or Facebook. Also, it would be nice to save an invite to be able to come back to it later before sending it. However, it got the job done eventually.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A good handy app
reviews.comment: This comes as a good handy app for creating an invite or want to check your invites instantly.
reviews.author: Vijay Reddy Chaganti

reviews.title: Android version
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work well. I can\'t update anything.  It wont save my edits. :(
reviews.author: Jamie Dorgan

reviews.title: Love this app.
reviews.comment: So much better than Facebook events.  Switched back over to evites this winter and event attendance has doubled.  The app is great manager and quite concise. Really easy to use.
reviews.author: Lyn McLaughlin

reviews.title: Convenient!
reviews.comment: Wonderful app! Simple, easy, and fast!
reviews.author: Stacy Williams

reviews.title: Useful App
reviews.comment: So far I find this app useful and convenient. I agree with the person who suggested linking events with your calendar, though.  That would be great if events would automatically be added to your calendar.
reviews.author: Summer Austin

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: I use it to set up all my gatherings. It stores all my contacts and formats everything into cute invites.
reviews.author: Erin Schoenberg

reviews.title: Bug with event dates
reviews.comment: Cool app but whenever I open the app the date on all of my upcoming events becomes the current date/time so I can\'t check the actual date/time without going to the Evite website.  Definitely a bug to be fixed and hopefully soon because the rest of the app is pretty great.
reviews.author: Stephanie Levin

reviews.title: I like it better than the mobile web
reviews.comment: It\'s a little faster & cleaner feeling than the mobile site for checking & rsvp-ing, and it isn\'t much help here in Potluck Lake, MN because you can\'t do anything with \"what to bring,\" but it sure as #&|| ain\'t for creating or editing. The whole platform could use a bunch of integration work, too. I reload it when I\'ve got more than a couple Evites to monitor, but it\'s uninstalled most of the time. Definitely a lightwieght phone app, not so much for tablets.
reviews.author: Janis Froehlig

reviews.title: Failure on multiple platforms
reviews.comment: This app is a failure! Trotted to setup an invite several times. Wrote up a huge message from host each time, but it crashed everyone I tried to add the location! Very frustrating!
reviews.author: Anu D

reviews.title: Handy App
reviews.comment: Use it to organize cub scout events, get headcount for planning. One issue is the app time is two hours off what the website version says. Can be confusing.
reviews.author: William Thompson

reviews.title: It\'s great!
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to have an app so I can invite people from my phone, I just wish I could include Facebook people that I don\'t have their emails.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super Easy to use & stay organized!
reviews.comment: This application is very easy to use and it helps me keep my children\'s friends birthday parties organized.
reviews.author: Athena Keehu

reviews.title: Works great, missing some functionality
reviews.comment: The app works great, allows me to see who is attending, create new invitations, update the invite etc.  This biggest functionality that is missing is being able to send an email to the invite guests when I make a change to the invite like I can from the website.  On the app, you edit the invite, the change saves and that\'s it - there is no option to send an update notification to attendees.  You have to log on to the website to do this.  If you add this functionality, it will be a 5-star app.
reviews.author: Keri Flint
